author: prbuzz.com
title: VRButton Announces Launch
text:
FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE
Cloud service makes VR viewing possible without extra software
SEPTEMBER 23, 2015 - VRButton is excited to announce the launch of their virtual reality immersion service. This new cloud-based service can be used by real estate agents to seamlessly upload stunning 360 degree videos and images.
Available by subscription, VRButton is a cloud B2B service that lets users view virtual reality content on websites without installation of any additional software. An ordinary smartphone can be inserted into the VR-headset, such as Google Cardboard, and the picture on the screen will be divided with images for the left eye and images for the right eye, thus creating a brilliant immersion effect as potential customers tour your property in the comfort of their own home.
Laptops and PCs will view tours in mono mode as they rotate the views. VRButton is pleased to announce their services and looks forward to helping real estate agents enhance their listings. More information can be found at http://vrbutton.org/en .
To get a glimpse into how the VRButton works, one can also visit:
http://view.vrbutton.org/mikrorayon_vesenniy/tour
About VRButton:
VRButton is a premier B2B cloud service that lets people view 360 degree images and video on any website without installing additional software.
Note! You can embed an example of VR tour on your web-site:
